name: Gallery and Lightbox
author: Oğulcan Özügenç

sections.description:
You can use this plugin to solve your Gallery and Lightbox problems. I have been working for a long time for this plugin to be usable on WordPress
I have my own server and thats why I can create most efficient plugins. I am always looking at the logs and PHP warnings. Normally shared hosting users cant see these warnings.
You can look to the “.php” files to understand how this plugin works.

I recommend you all the 5 plugins that I have created.

Supported languages:

  • Türkçe
  • English
  • Deutsch

Donations

You can contact me for donations! Thanks in advance.
sections.installation:
1. Upload gallery-and-lightbox to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enable this plugin on option page

There is no settings page on user end. You can use like below on the WordPress post edit page. You have to change image links and caption names. This plugin supports maximum of 20 images. The usage of captions are not necessary.

[gal_gallery image_cover = “cover.jpg” image_1=”image_1.jpg” caption_cover = “Caption Cover” caption_1=”Image 1″]
sections.changelog:
1.0.14

  • WordPress 5.3.2 support added

  • some performance improvements

1.0.12

  • problem when using only one picture solved

1.0.11

  • screenshots renewed

  • random code changed
  • language support code renewed and optimized, it is faster now
  • Deutsch support added

1.0.9

  • added border to number block

1.0.7

  • hover problem on some sites solved
  • caching of old files solved with “vers” variable

1.0.6

  • version numbers changed
  • caching of old files solved

1.0.05

  • licence file edited
  • hover problem because of the 1.0.04 update solved
  • shortcode shortcut support at WordPress editor will be made in near future

1.0.04

  • php code improved
  • codes beautified
  • screenshots renewed

1.0.03

  • styling is improved

1.0.02

  • added English support

1.0

  • plugin released
